name: APEX
description: ApeX Protocol is one of the leading decentralized exchanges (DEX) redefining the way users trade and earn in crypto. On ApeX, you can trade Perpetuals, Spot, Tokenized Stocks, and even join Prediction Markets — all while maintaining full control of your assets. Whether you're exploring high-speed trades, passive income, or access to unique market opportunities, ApeX has the tools to power your strategy. Trade with deep liquidity, near-zero fees, advanced order types, robust API — all from a self-custodial, permissionless platform.
